snippet: A fourth white man pleaded guilty to hate crime charges on Tuesday in the killing of a black man who was robbed, beaten and run over by a pickup in Jackson.
abstract: William Montgomery is fourth white man to plead guilty to hate crime charges in killing of James C Anderson, a black man who was robbed, beaten and run over by a pickup in Jackson, Miss.
lead_paragraph: A fourth white man pleaded guilty to hate crime charges on Tuesday in the killing of a black man who was robbed, beaten and run over by a pickup in Jackson.

headline.main: Mississippi: Fourth Guilty Plea in Hate Crime
headline.print_headline: Mississippi: Fourth Guilty Plea In Hate Crime
